comment: Professor Lubben is a great and funny teacher who works hard at making class enjoyable and interesting for his students. I took him for Wellness, which is usually a boring class but he really worked hard at providing interesting guest speakers for us. Attendance is optional, but he gives numerous chances extra credit points to those who attend.

Prof Lubben is amazing! So nice, if you come to class its extra credit at the end of the semester. He says attendance is mandatory but is really just for extra credit. I took his hybrid Wellness class so most of the work was on Bearface. Remember to do work by the due dates, EASY A!

I would absolutely 100% take him again. I had him for wellness and we just had to do Bearface. There were no hard due dates for any of the work as long as you got everything done before the end of the course you are good. Participation isn't mandatory at all. Take him take him take him!

I took this class as a hybrid and it was straightforward. We used BearFace, where all our assignments and readings were on. We had guess speakers that were pretty cool and informative, so that was a plus. Come to class and actually do the activities that are listed if youre interested in bettering yourself and your health. Prof Lubben was great.
Very nice guy. Class is said to be mandatory but really isnt.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor Lubben is a cool professor. The class is a very easy A and attendance isn't mandatory at all.
Professor Lubben is a very nice guy. He isn't really prepared for the class though. Very easy to pass. Not really mandatory to show up.

This guy does not care at all about anything! Syllabus is "negotiated" throughout the entire semester so NOTHING and I mean nothing is clear. Due dates change, requirements change, it is the most unorganized "class" at KSU. It's a very easy A depending on what mood he is in when he makes up your grade.
I was interested in taking sociology but i didn't learn one theory in this class. We had a lot of guest speakers, overall quite easy.

If you take Professor Lubben and fail then you deserve to go back to kindergarten! Period! :-) He makes our student life so easy. No busy work, exams or unnecessary demands for papers. 1 paper, journals, and class participation. Every semester you need that one class that is not too demanding, this is it! TAKE HIM!!!
Best teacher every. Really cares about students!

I have gone to three different universities. Mr Lubben was by far the best professor I have ever had. Not only did I learn a lot but he really cared about the students. He would out of his way to help. Take his class!

Good class, he really just wants u to have fun in his class. Do take him. His way of teaching is very different just listen to him and you will learn a lot of wisdom if you are patience enough and or mindful enough to try to learn from him. His class is really easy but to get the most out of it, just listen to what his message is.

Professor Lubben is extremely knowledgeable about the material he is teaching. He encourages class participation. He also booked speakers to come in from all different backgrounds and companies to talk to the class. This was very influential to the students as we were able to learn from many different professionals.

Easiest class ever! 3 papers and you are done. Class attendance is a joke, but it's interesting if you go. He expects a lot of participation from you (if you go), but it is easy to jump in and join the conversation. If you are looking for an easy A I would recommend him, but if you really want to learn I would look elsewhere.

He's probably the easiest teacher you will ever take. He gives papers that are rather short, there is not test, no quizzes really. He really want you to have fun in his class. He's very laid back and sometimes class is cancelled. The guest speaker days are interesting. Go to at least 2 of those.
Great person, very fun
FUN class. I thought it would be boring.  I actually learned a lot
Pretty straight forward class show up do the work and you'll be fine. You get the grade you work for not an easy A if you skip class
Very nice. Wants you to have "fun" in class. Cares about students

He does not lecture a single time and puts information that is not mentioned in class on the final. He brought his personal political and religious beliefs into the course and it was uncomfortable. He's not a hard grader but there isn't much to go on, since he doesn't post on D2L. If you want an easy A and don't care about Sociology, take him.
Very nice
Very fun and interesting

Easy A if you try. 2 easy  papers topic of your choice. Midterm & Final kind of difficult but they're online so passable) Extra credit given. Attendance not mandatory but extremely encouraged as 25% of you grade is "participation" (you can email him a ch. summary if you don't like speaking in class, but if he knows who you are you will do fine)

This class reminded me of a high school BS class. If you show up, he gives test questions. You write two short, simple papers, a few easy extra credit assignments(watch a movie). Tests are online, open book. I'd recommend him!
